website_summaries.verdict: Generally, Salomon’s Evasion 2 Aero received a mix of good and bad points. Those who like a sticky outsole without the extra weight may enjoy this day hiking shoe. However, the reported drawbacks might scare potential buyers away. Its flawed fit and sizing were not received lightly by consumers. All in all, getting a pair of Evasion 2 Aero may require a bit of an effort. Trying it out on a local store to get the best fit will help. Also, users may still have to put up with its break-in period.
pros: A handful of Evasion 2 Aero owners appreciated its low weight
Once softened up, it was a comfortable hiking shoe, according to several users
A couple of wearers mentioned that they were sold with its breathability
Some verified purchasers commented that the Evasion 2 Aero from Salomon rendered good grip
cons: A majority of brand loyalists were disappointed with its small sizing
They noted that they have been wearing Salomon products for years, but with the Evasion 2 Aero sizing was way off
Its narrow forefoot dismayed most customers
A few users were not happy with its break-in period

customer_reviews.title: God looking and  comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I tend to use SALOMON stuff for my hiking and which I walk about 1600 miles in a year, that equates to about 6 months walking for me, so personally hiking shoes/boots are good for about 800 to 900 miles before they become unserviceable. The only thing I miss from this pair is the speed lace which wasn't available at the price I paid, I mean these were quite cheap by Salomon standards.
customer_reviews.author: senta410

customer_reviews.title: Quality as usual
customer_reviews.text: I love this model of Salomon they tend to last me 3 to 4 years total leisure time usage. I have bad knees and this is the only brand that I wear as they help. Stay looking good, clean easily and so comfortable. My wife hates this light colour and normally orders me the dark so I got them ordered before she had a chance, don't believe her these are lovely and look good with jeans or shorts on hols. I you have never tried Salomons then do, you will never buy trainers again. tj
customer_reviews.author: tjpearson

customer_reviews.title: Salomon need to sort out their sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on the function of the shoes. However it's worth pointing out that the Aero model doesn't seem to be water resistant. The GTX, however is. They look well made as you would expect from a this brand. What I can say is that they are definitely incorrectly sized. I bought these for my father who is a uk6, having read the reviews I bought him a uk6.5 which were still too small so I ended up getting him a 7, which fitted him ok but not with walking socks. So I would reccomend going for at least 1 size above your usual size. And if you're after water resistance go for the GTX version.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Rosewood

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, small fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, good grip, fit is on the small side out-of-the-box but should loosen up a bit. I am usually a size 10UK and these are size 10.5UK so you should plan on buying half to one size bigger. Service from the seller was excellent - first parcel went missing and they dealt with it very efficiently and sent out a new one very quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Miniscule pixie shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Looking shabby after 1 year of wear

Shame as they are a comfortable shoe, but no match for my previous pair of Merrells which remained watertight and lasted a good 4 years before one of them started to discolour.

customer_reviews.title: Usual Salomon quality. Recommended.

product_meta.title: Salomon Men's Hiking Shoes, Evasion 2 Aero
product_meta.description: The EVASION 2 AERO hiking shoes will take you far on any trail you find yourself. Comfort: The lightweight, breathable and abrasion-resistant materials allow for the utmost comfort. Lightness: Enjoy a lightweight shoe (around 385 g), even on longer workouts. Adjusts and Fastens to the Foot: From the injected EVA midsole to the lacing system, the Sensifit system perfectly cradles the foot for a snug fit. Sole: The resistant Contagrip sole with deep lugs means improved durability and maximum grip on any surface.
